EmailTemplate.name: 2021 Dealer Update #6.2021 Dealer Update #6
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletins - March 2021
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Sales Bulletins | March 2021 New Sales Bulletins Honeywell is pleased to announce the following bulletins:
- 2021-10 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-10-Rev-B-FMS-6--1-Upgrade-for-Business-Aircraft-Equipped-with-NZ-2000.pdf]]>FMS 6.1 Upgrade for Business Aircraft Equipped with NZ-2000 - 2021-20 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-20 Rev A - CMA 6800 LCD Display Unit Upgrade.pdf]]> CMA 6800 LCD Display Unit Upgrade - 2021-44 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-44 Rev A JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft - 2021-49 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-49 Rev A RESCU 406 AFN to AFN2 Trade-In Program.pdf]]> RESCU 406 AFN to AFN2 Trade-In Program - 2021-51 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2021-51 Rev A AMT-50 to AMT-700 Trade-In Program.pdf]]> AMT-50 to AMT-700 Trade-In Program - OIB 2021-09 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB-2021-09 - Multipurpose-Control-and-Display-Unit-Replacement-for-Business-Aircraft.pdf]]> Multipurpose Control and Display Unit Replacement for Business Aircraft - OIB 2021-20 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2021-20 - CMA 6800 LCD Display Unit Upgrade.pdf]]> CMA 6800 LCD Display Unit Upgrade - OIB 2021-40 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2021-40 - Laseref IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]> LASEREF IV Upgrade for Business Aircraft - OIB 2021-44 Rev A <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/OIB 2021-44 Rev A JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>JetWave Promotions for Business Aircraft
Dealers can find these bulletins on our website <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/about-myaerospace]]> under Purchase/Orders/Sales Bulletins.
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
